title: The CU Colorado Learning and Teaching with Technology (COLTT) Conference Fund
description: To provide support for the promotion, coordination, and implementation of CU's COLTT (Colorado Learning and Teaching with Technology) annual conference and Galloping COLTT events throughout the year.
marketingContent: To provide support for the promotion, coordination, and implementation of CU's COLTT (Colorado Learning and Teaching with Technology) annual conference and Galloping COLTT events throughout the year.
